metadata.Title: CVE-2021-45095 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: pep_sock_accept in net/phonet/pep.c in the Linux kernel through 5.15.8 hasa refcount leak.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
